name: Cosmic Disco (itch)
description:
Feel the beat! A VR rhythm-shooter where you kill enemies to the beat, as they fly towards you, alternating pistols hand to hand, surrounded by beautiful skies which breathe with music! Created by a solo developer.

  • Shoot rhythmically in beat to win!
  • Beautiful skies which breathe with music! (Musical visualization)
  • Different Modes: Alternating pistols hand to hand, Only one pistol, No laser pointer, Aim assist (Easier hitboxes) etc.
  • Electronic Music Soundtrack by "Monowoman", "uap" and others!
  • Solo-developed by an author who was inspired by "Hotline Miami" and "My Friend Pedro" and wanted to recreate some of these feelings in VR
  • Join the Discord or itch Forum to make suggestions and improve the game :)
